#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
#define MOD 10000007
using namespace std;

void multiply(ll a[2][2] , ll b[2][2])
{
	ll p=( a[0][0] * b[0][0] + a[0][1] * b[1][0] )%MOD ;
	ll q= ( a[0][0] * b[0][1] + a[0][1] * b[1][1] )%MOD;
	ll r= ( a[1][0] * b[0][0] + a[1][1] * b[1][0] )%MOD;
	ll s= (a[1][0] * b[0][1] + a[1][1] * b[1][1] )%MOD ;
	a[0][0]=p;
	a[0][1]=q;
	a[1][0]=r;
	a[1][1]=s;
}
void power (ll a[2][2] ,ll expo )
{
	if(expo==0 || expo==1 )
		return ;
	
	power (a, expo/2) ;
	multiply(a,a);
	ll b[2][2] = { {1,2},{1,0} };
	if(expo & 1)
		multiply (a,b);
	
}
int main()
{
	int t,i;ll n,ans;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		ll x[2]={1,5},y[2][2] ={{1,2},{1,0} };
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		if(n<3)
			ans=x[n-1];
		if(n>2)
		{
			power(y,n-2);
			ans=( y[0][0] * 5 + y[0][1] * 1 )%MOD;
		}
		printf("%lld\n",ans );
		
	}
	return 0;
}
